text: Rodrigo Andrés Ramírez Miranda (born 15 February 1982) was a Chilean footballer. He played as a defender with O'Higgins in the Primera División de Chile using the No. 7 jersey. His speed and technique at right wing has earned him the nickname Garrincha. ==External links== * * Category:Chilean footballers Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:C.D. title: Rodrigo Ramírez
